Text:
so what is this.. 
wallpapers , screen saver or a theme ??
This is a THEME for Windows 7. Read the INFO!!!

If this is really a theme and not just a wall-paper, could you please provide a screen-shot?

Why does everyone think I give a shit about their damn wall-papers anyways? I'm not gonna use it, I'm gonna use my own.
If you knew anything about the windows 7 desktop you would understand that the background can be set to change on a  preset time much like a screen saver.
